name: John Snow 1/6th scale collectible figure
description: This stunning 1/6th scale Threezero figure of Jon Snow stands a full 11 1/2 inches tall. Based on Season 8 of Game of Thrones, it features a custom-designed body, and a finely detailed head sculpt that truly captures the likeness of actor Kit Harrington. The figure comes with Jon's Warden of the North outfit, complete with leather vambraces, fur coat, glove ends (when displaying without the vambraces), two belts, and a pair of boots. The figure also comes with three sets of exchangeable hands -- one pair of fists, one pair of relaxed hands, and one pair of gripped hands. Finally, Jon comes with three weapons: his Longclaw sword, his dagger and scabbard, and his Dragonglass dagger.

name: King Joffrey Baratheon 1/6th scale collectible figure
description: This Threezero King Joffrey Baratheon 1/6th deluxe collectible figure from Game of Thrones features an 11.5 inch custom designed action body, and a head sculpt that captures a stunning likeness of actor Jack Gleeson. The figure comes with interchangeable hair and crown, an intricately-tailored cloth tunic, a royal sash, black trousers, boots, a belt, and a hip quiver. It also includes exchangeable hands -- one pair of fists, one relaxed pair, and two pairs of opened hands. Weapons accessories include Joffrey's crossbow and five arrows, and this deluxe version of the figure also comes with a special bonus accessory, his Widow's Wail sword with scabbard.

name: Brienne of Tarth 1/6th scale collectible figure
description: This 1/6 scale collectible figure of Brienne of Tarth from Season 7 of Game of Thrones will be a great addition to your collection. Standing at 12.5 inches tall, this figure features a stunning likeness of actress Gwendoline Christie as Brienne, including textured hair, piercing eyes, and bold face. Brienne is dressed with tailored cloth garb, including detailed armor pieces, belt, and boots. Her hands are exchangeable, and her arms move, so she can be posed making different gestures, including holding Oathkeeper her trusty sword. The sword can also be sheathed in its scabbard. This deluxe version of the figure also comes with Brienne's cloak.

name: White Walker 1/6th scale collectible deluxe figure
description: Add to your Game of Thrones collection with this stunning 1/6th scale deluxe White Walker figure from Threezero. This figure stands 13 inches tall, and includes tailored clothing with finely detailed textures, a life-like head, shoulder mantle, breastplate, forearm bracers, boots, a spear, and more. It also comes with exchangeable hands -- one in a relaxed position, and another in a gripped position -- a faux-leather skirt, and bare feet.

name: Wight Viserion
description: This Game of Thrones figure is part of an exclusive line from San Diego Comic-Con 2018. This figure is of the ice dragon, Wight Viserion. Measuring 4.5 inches, the Wight Viserion is made with impressive detail, including deep black scales, black nails and piercing blue eyes. Due to limited quantities, we recommend one for your collection and one for play.

name: Daenerys Targaryen Action Figure
description: This detailed 6 inch figure of Daenerys Targaryen, from the hit HBO series Game of Thrones, features 12 points of articulation. The figure is dressed in iconic attire from Season 7 of Game of Thrones. The figure also comes with four map marker accessories.

name: John Snow Action Figure
description: This detailed 6 inch figure of Jon Snow, from the hit HBO series Game of Thrones, features 12 points of articulation. The figure is dressed in iconic attire from Season 7 of Game of Thrones. The figure also comes with his trusty sword, Longclaw and a Dragonglass dagger.

name: Drogon Dragon Scuplt
description: This Game of Thrones sculpture features a striking rendition of the dragon Drogon. Amazingly detailed and hand painted, this sculpture of Drogon stands approximately 4.5 inches tall.

name: Ghost Direwolf Plush
description: A litter of direwolf cubs is discovered by the children of House Stark. They adopt and raise them. The direwolves grow to become fearsome guardians and loyal companions. This quality plush represents Jon Snow's direwolf, Ghost the Albino. Ghost measures 18 inches long.

name: Brown Dragon Egg Plush
description: Long thought to be extinct, the only remnants of the dragon species are a trio of seemingly petrified Dragon eggs given to Daenerys Targaryen as a wedding gift. Daenerys, the Mother of Dragons, later hatches the eggs in the funeral pyre of husband Khal Drogo. This brown plush dragon egg is a soft replica of the one featured in a pivotal episode of Game of Thrones.

name: Viserion Ice Dragon Plush
description: Originally born of fire, and struck down by an ice spear into a frozen lake, Viserion is reanimated by the Night King, becoming the first ever Dragon wight. This collectible jumbo plush captures the 'Icy Dragon' ready to take flight. Featuring brilliantly blue light-up eyes, a 2-foot wingspan and standing 19 inches tall, there's no wonder that Viserion is the Dragon mounted by the Night King leading the charge against the Seven Kingdoms.

name: Game of Thrones Clue
description: High treachery and betrayal are behind the two mysteries to solve in Game of Thrones Clue. Featuring a double-sided game board, players choose to solve the murder mystery in The Red Keep or in Meereen. WHO was responsible for plotting the murder? WHAT weapon was used and WHERE did the crime take place?

name: Game of Thrones Monopoly
description: Represent your favorite House and be part of the hit HBO series Game of Thrones, with this Game of Thrones Collector's edition Monopoly from Hasbro. Travel the legendary lands of Westeros as you buy, sell, and trade locations from the Seven Kingdoms. Build your empire and maybe your House will sit on the Iron Throne.

name: Game of Trones Rish
description: RISK: Game of Thrones Edition Game escalates Risk, the classic game of strategic conquest, to an epic level of chaos and war in a battle for the Iron Throne. Featuring striking game packaging, two custom-designed game boards, three ways to play, seven finely sculpted armies, and more than 650 total pieces, this game of strategic conquest will test the wits and bravery of both Risk and Game of Thrones fans.

name: Iron Throne Model
description: Build your own Iron Throne and decorate your home, dorm, or office with this Iron Throne Metal Model from Game of Thrones. Model measures 2.72in x 4.33in x 2.6in.

name: The MOuntain Metal Model
description: Fear the Mountain -- build out this metal model of The Mountain from Game of Thrones! Perfect for decorating your home, dorm, or office, this model measures 3.07in x 3.15in x 5.9in.

name: 9in 3D Globe puzzle
description: Rediscover and explore the vast, fantastical realm of Game of Thrones with this 3D Westeros and Essos Globe Puzzle. 4D Cityscape brings to you a global map of the world made popular by the epic HBO television series and collection of fantasy novels. This 240-piece jigsaw puzzle is made up of slightly curved plastic pieces, to be assembled and presented on the included display stand.

name: Night King acrylic sword
description: This stunning replica of the Night King's sword from Game of Thrones measures 41.75 inches in length, and is wrapped at the handle with faux-leather.

name: Kink in the North longclaw sword
description: Proudly display a Longclaw in your own home with this stunning King in the North edition Longclaw sword replica from Game of Thrones. This King in the North Edition features the direwolf -- the sigil of House Stark -- and is made from the highest quality materials. This adult collectible is an officially licensed product and has been painstakingly crafted to match the sword used during the production of the HBO award-winning series. Limited to 1500 pieces worlwide, this sword comes with a certificate of authenticity and a display plaque.

name: Ice Sword letter opener
description: This Game of Thrones Ice letter opener has a diecast metal handle and stainless steel blade. This handsome letter opener measures 9 inches.

name: Needle, sword of Arya Stark
description: The younger of the Stark daughters, Arya has put her survival skills to use as she continues to evade the forces that seek her. This adult collectible is officially licensed from HBOr's hit series Game of Thronesr and each sword is individually serialized. It includes a display plaque and a certificate of authenticity. This item is not a toy, please keep out of the reach of children.

name: Oath Keeper
description: Brienne is a highborn lady who would rather be a knight. As Catelyn Stark's envoy, she escorted Jaime Lannister back to Kings Landing. The two fighters developed a mutual respect for each other during their journey. She is given Oathkeeper by Jaime after his father, Lord Tywin Lannister, melts down Eddard Stark's Valyrian sword Ice and has Oathkeeper, as well as a sword for King Joffrey, made from the metal. This adult collectible is officially licensed from HBO's hit series Game of Thrones. It is a limited edition of 500 pieces and includes a certificate of authenticity and display plaque.

name: Catspaw foam blade
description: Prove the worth of Valyrian foam by wielding this Foam Catspaw Blade from the hit HBO series Game of Thrones.  This lovely mock weapon is crafted in perfect detail, just like the weapon that almost took Bran from us early in the show!
